scripts.js: mkdir -p public && browserify client.js -o public/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.js-w: mkdir -p public && watchify client.js -o public/bundle.js -dv -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ]
scripts.dev: shell-exec 'npm run css-w' 'npm run js-w' 'nodemon server.js'
scripts.start: npm run css && npm run js && node server.js
